text: Marko Perinović (born 29 October 1970) is a Croatian rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Croatia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zadar
title: Marko Perinović
